evidence.claim: FrontierBPM leverages AWS services for cloud infrastructure and data processing.
The company is committed to HIPAA compliance in its health tech solutions.
Integration with HL7 standards is mentioned on their technical documentation page.
Utilizes Snowflake for data warehousing and advanced analytics in health services.
Offers RESTful APIs for efficient data integrations across platforms.

icp.icp_reason: No clear evidence of involvement with X12 transactions or clear use cases found on the site.
